languages.text: "Как никогда, Вольный Торговец! Мое место — на поле праведного боя, рядом с {mf|Избранником|Избранницей} Императора, что помог{mf||ла} мне пройти путь до конца и обрести святую реликвию! Веди, и я последую".

traits.locale_text: "Как никогда, Вольный Торговец! Мое место — на поле праведного боя, рядом с {mf|Избранником|Избранницей} Императора, что помог{mf||ла} мне пройти путь до конца и обрести святую реликвию! Веди, и я последую".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."
languages.original_text: "Как никогда, Вольный Торговец! Мое место — на поле праведного боя, рядом с {mf|Избранником|Избранницей} Императора, что помог{mf||ла} мне пройти путь до конца и обрести святую реликвию! Веди, и я последую".

traits.locale_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Más que nunca, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Mi sitio está en el campo de batalla, librando mi guerra santa junto {mf|al elegido|a la elegida} del Emperador, {mf|el|la} que me ha ayudado a alcanzar el final de mi viaje y obtener la sagrada reliquia! Lidéreme y yo le seguiré».
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: «¡Más que nunca, Comerciante Independiente! ¡Mi sitio está en el campo de batalla, librando mi guerra santa junto {mf|al elegido|a la elegida} del Emperador, {mf|el|la} que me ha ayudado a alcanzar el final de mi viaje y obtener la sagrada reliquia! Lidéreme y yo le seguiré».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ますますあなたについていきたいと思っている、自由開拓者よ！ 私の巡礼の旅を支え、聖なる遺物を手に入れるように支援をしてくれた、皇帝の選ばれし者の側で正義の戦いに身を投じるために私は生まれてきた。どこへ導こうと、私はあなたについて行こう」
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: 「ますますあなたについていきたいと思っている、自由開拓者よ！ 私の巡礼の旅を支え、聖なる遺物を手に入れるように支援をしてくれた、皇帝の選ばれし者の側で正義の戦いに身を投じるために私は生まれてきた。どこへ導こうと、私はあなたについて行こう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “我比以往任何时候都更愿意跟随你，行商浪人！我的使命就是在正义的战场上，与帝皇的选民并肩作战。你帮助我抵达了旅途的终点，找到了圣物！领导我们吧，我愿意追随你。”
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: “我比以往任何时候都更愿意跟随你，行商浪人！我的使命就是在正义的战场上，与帝皇的选民并肩作战。你帮助我抵达了旅途的终点，找到了圣物！领导我们吧，我愿意追随你。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Plus que jamais, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Ma place est sur le champ de bataille, aux côtés de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur qui m'a aidée à atteindre mon but et à obtenir la sainte relique ! Montrez-moi le chemin et je vous suivrai. »
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: « Plus que jamais, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Ma place est sur le champ de bataille, aux côtés de l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur qui m'a aidée à atteindre mon but et à obtenir la sainte relique ! Montrez-moi le chemin et je vous suivrai. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Mehr denn je, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Mein Platz ist auf dem Feld der rechtschaffenen Schlacht an der Seite {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Imperators, {mf|der|die} mir geholfen hat, meine Reise abzuschließen und das heilige Relikt zu finden! Führt, und ich werde folgen."
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: "Mehr denn je, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Mein Platz ist auf dem Feld der rechtschaffenen Schlacht an der Seite {mf|des|der} Auserwählten des Imperators, {mf|der|die} mir geholfen hat, meine Reise abzuschließen und das heilige Relikt zu finden! Führt, und ich werde folgen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

languages.text: "Hem de nasıl! Hür Tacir, benim yazgımda İmparator'un Seçilmişi ile meşru savaşlarda omuz omuza çarpışmak var. Sayende yolculuğumun sonuna erip yüce yadigârı elde ettim! Emrine amadeyim."
languages.original_text: "More than ever, Rogue Trader! My place is on the field of righteous battle at the side of the Emperor's chosen, the one who helped me reach my journey's end and obtain the holy relic! Lead, and I will follow."

traits.locale_text: "Hem de nasıl! Hür Tacir, benim yazgımda İmparator'un Seçilmişi'yle meşru savaşlarda omuz omuza çarpışmak var. Sayende yolculuğumun sonuna erip yüce yadigârı elde ettim! Emrine amadeyim."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
